body.name: Storkcraft Brookside 6 Drawer Double Dresser (Pebble Gray) – GREENGUARD Gold Certified, Dresser For Nursery, 6 Drawer Dresser, Kids Dresser, Nursery Dresser Drawer Organizer, Chest of Drawers

features: GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED, SAFETY TESTED: GREENGUARD Gold Certified products are screened for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs known to pollute indoor air; Tested to meet or exceed applicable CPSIA & ASTM International category safety standards

COMPATIBLE WITH CHANGING TOPPER: Complete your Storkcraft Brookside 6 Drawer Double Dresser with the compatible Storkcraft Nest Changing Topper to transform your dresser organizer into a multipurpose changing station; Changing topper sold separately

NURSERY AND KIDS BEDROOM DRESSER: Universal design to match any nursery or kids bedroom; 6 drawer bedroom dresser; Crafted of wood composites, laminated with a durable, easy-to-clean PU coated surface, and includes Euro drawer glides; Assembly required

EXPERT TESTED: Storkcraft dressers are tested at third-party, accredited laboratories to meet or exceed all applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards; Packaging is tested to reduce the risk of incidental shipment-related damage

AWARD-WINNING BRAND: Storkcraft is the proud recipient of the Parent Tested Parent Approved (PTPA) Seal of Approval, 2023 PTPA Top Product Award, and 2023 Women’s Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Customer Recommended Baby & Kids Furniture
Note: To ensure proper assembly, please follow all steps provided in the assembly video
body.description: Timeless in design, the Storkcraft Brookside 6 Drawer Dresser combines slender, metal handles and modern bracket feet for sophisticated style. Featuring six spacious drawers on euro-glide metal tracks and safety stops, this dresser can securely store all your child’s clothes, toys and other belongings. Fastened with German cam locks and finished with high-quality laminate in a selection of rich colors and finishes, this dresser is durable and resistant against dirt or accidental spills. The Storkcraft Brookside 6 Drawer Dresser is expert tested to meet all applicable federal safety standards, in addition to federal anti-tipping standards. Designed to coordinate with any home furniture and built to grow with your child well into adolescence, the Storkcraft Brookside 6 Drawer Dresser offers an abundance of storage in an affordable package.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Storkcraft Brookside 6 Drawer Double Dresser Timeless in design, the Storkcraft Brookside 6 Drawer Dresser combines slender, metal handles and modern bracket feet for sophisticated style. Storkcraft Horizon 3-Drawer Chest with Changing Topper Complete your Storkcraft Carmel Collection by pairing your Storkcraft Carmel 5-in-1 Convertible Crib with the matching Storkcraft Carmel 3-Drawer Chest with Changing Topper. Storkcraft Beckham 3 Drawer Chest with Changing Topper Modern design, convenient storage, convertible functionality, and amazing value. The Storkcraft Beckham 3-Drawer Chest with Changing Topper is an all-in-one changing and storage solution designed for today’s nursery, and ready to continue serving families beyond the baby years.

Storkcraft Solstice 5-in-1 Convertible Crib The Storkcraft Solstice 4-in-1 Convertible Crib features clean lines, classic dowels, a detailed back panel, and angled feet that will add a touch of modern style to your baby’s nursery. Storkcraft Modern Nursery Baby Dresser With Changing Table Top & Drawers Add unparalleled, modern style and function to your nursery with the all-new Storkcraft Modern Nursery Changing Table Dresser. Storkcraft Horizon 3-Drawer Chest with Changing Topper When your child has grown, the Carmel’s changing topper is removable, so the Carmel can be used as a bedroom storage chest for years after. Built to last, the Carmel is crafted with engineered wood, durable steel hardware, and Euro-glide drawers with safety stops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ample storage space & sturdy
reviews.reviewText: The Storkcraft Brookside 6 Drawer Double Dresser exceeded my expectations in both style and functionality. Its sleek design seamlessly blends with my child room decor, and the ample storage space keeps everything organized. The drawers glide smoothly, and the quality of construction is evident in its sturdy build. Assembly was straightforward, and the durability of the dresser makes it a worthwhile investment. Overall, I'm highly satisfied with the Storkcraft Brookside dresser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Larger than I thought, very pretty and sturdy. Takes a long time to put together but it’s worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent, but not great
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent dresser for the price. It’s definitely gotten banged up pretty easily after a little over a year. The drawers can come out somewhat easily, so be careful with toddlers. It’s serves its purpose and has decent space. Just not the most durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for young child
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice dresser. Easy to put together and it's a nice color. It is pretty sturdy and the drawers slide nicely along the tracks. It was well packaged no damages upon delivery.*When assembling the drawers ensure the screw is visible in the bottom (see attached photo) When drilling the drawer tracks on the dresser, make sure to drill the screw all the way flat to allow the drawer to glide smoothly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent, sturdy, good quality, and not undersized

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my nursery. It arrived late. Upon unboxing, two key pieces were broke in half. I contacted Amazon and they told me I could PAY to return the dresser to them and get a refund for the remaining after shipping or I could contact the manufacturer. I contacted Storkcraft and sent them the necessary info immediately. Two long weeks later the pieces arrived. We went to assemble it and the new pieces are too short. I contact them AGAIN. Their warranty department told me to disassemble the dresser, ship it back to Amazon and order a new one “if I wanted faster service”. I call a now FOURTH time regarding this purchase and I’m told that they will send out new parts and “hopefully they will fit” but they cannot expedite shipping or priority and we’re not sympathetic. Do not do business with this company. They do not care to have it. It is BY FAR the WORST customer service experience I’ve had. Shame on Storkcraft and shame on Amazon for expecting me to pay shipping to return a DRESSER that arrived broken.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for money very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I love this dresser form color to sturdiness. It did take a while to put together. It was not the easiest requieres lots of time and patience. Once put together I noticed how nice and sturdy the dresser was. Drawers slide open easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It will look nice but isn’t very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: It does the trick, but for the price it wasn’t worth it. Most of the pre-drilled holes don’t line up and snag when opening/closing the drawers. We had to go back in and reinforce several spots. It looks nice but is definitely cheaply made.
